ARABIC: وَمِنْ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلْجَوَارِ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَٰمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Among His Signs are the tall ships sailing like mountains through the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Ships sailing in the ocean like ensigns are a sign of His.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And of His Signs are the ships that sail in the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Further evidence (of His existence) are the ships which stand as mountains in the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And among His signs are the ships sailing on the sea, like hills.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And among His signs are the ships in the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And among His signs are the ships in the sea like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And of His signs are the ships that run on the sea like landmarks;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And of His portents are the ships, like banners on the sea;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Among His signs are the ships sailing like mountains on the sea:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And of His signs are the ships in the sea like landmarks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Among His signs are the ships [that run] on the sea [appearing] like landmarks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And among His Signs are the ships, smooth-running through the ocean, (tall) as mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And among His Signs are the ships, in the sea, like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And among His signs are the ships that run on the sea like mountains and
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And of His signs are the ships sailing the sea like flags.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [42:32] And of His signs are the ships [that run] on the sea [appearing] like landmarks, like mountains, in terms of their magnitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And of His portents) and of the signs of His divine Oneness and power (are the ships, like banners) like hills (on the sea;
